body.p: GStreamer is a large project, so it's split up into several modules. Most people need at least gstreamer and gst-plugins to do anything useful.

Here's a quick overview of all of our modules :
module description stable version devel version
gstreamer The core library, tools and plugins 0.6.4 0.7.3
gst-plugins Set of media handling plugins 0.6.4 0.7.3
gst-editor A graphical pipeline editor
gst-player Our sample player application
gst-recorder Our sample recorder application
gst-python GStreamer python bindings
